A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want to like this since it used to be a good franchise. However\, this just isn't good. Not once was there any tension to be felt and not one plot turn was surprising. Not one character has depth and neither does the plot. Disney took a dying franchise and turned it to shit. Anyone feeling this is looking with triple rose tinted glasses and closed eyes. This is just a steaming pile of shit with a recognizable name.
